Description: Marble epitaph plaque with funerary inscription for Caius Annius Draco.
Curator's comments: Bibl.: Todisco, E. (1999) I veterani in Italia in età imperiale (Edipuglia: Bari), p. 19 The inscription displays the typical tendency of classiarii from the provinces to express their ethnic origins.
Bibliographic references: CIL X / Inscriptiones Bruttiorum, Lucaniae, Campaniae, Siciliae, Sardiniae Latinae (3516)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Gaius Annius Draco
